mapper.select: SELECT /*根据客户编码查询未完全核销的单据：预收单 */ D.DEPOSIT_RECEIVED_NO AS BILL_NO, #{BILL_UNVERIFY_ACTIVE_US} AS BILL_PARENT_TYPE, D.BILL_TYPE AS BILL_TYPE, D.CUSTOMER_NAME AS CUSTOMER_NAME, D.CUSTOMER_CODE AS CUSTOMER_CODE, D.UNVERIFY_AMOUNT AS UNVERIFY_AMOUNT FROM STL.T_STL_BILL_DEPOSIT_RECEIVED D WHERE D.CUSTOMER_CODE = #{customerCode} AND D.UNVERIFY_AMOUNT>0 AND D.ACTIVE = #{BILL_UNVERIFY_ACTIVE_Y} UNION SELECT /*根据客户编码查询未完全核销的单据：应收单 */ R.RECEIVABLE_NO AS BILL_NO, #{BILL_UNVERIFY_ACTIVE_YS} AS BILL_PARENT_TYPE, R.BILL_TYPE AS BILL_TYPE, R.CUSTOMER_NAME AS CUSTOMER_NAME, R.CUSTOMER_CODE AS CUSTOMER_CODE, R.UNVERIFY_AMOUNT AS UNVERIFY_AMOUNT FROM STL.T_STL_BILL_RECEIVABLE R WHERE R.CUSTOMER_CODE = #{customerCode} AND R.UNVERIFY_AMOUNT>0 AND R.ACTIVE = #{BILL_UNVERIFY_ACTIVE_Y} UNION SELECT /*根据客户编码查询未完全核销的单据：应付单 */ P.PAYABLE_NO AS BILL_NO, #{BILL_UNVERIFY_ACTIVE_YF} AS BILL_PARENT_TYPE, P.BILL_TYPE AS BILL_TYPE, P.CUSTOMER_NAME AS CUSTOMER_NAME, P.CUSTOMER_CODE AS CUSTOMER_CODE, P.UNVERIFY_AMOUNT AS UNVERIFY_AMOUNT FROM STL.T_STL_BILL_PAYABLE P WHERE P.CUSTOMER_CODE = #{customerCode} AND P.UNVERIFY_AMOUNT > 0 AND P.ACTIVE = #{BILL_UNVERIFY_ACTIVE_Y} UNION SELECT /*根据客户编码查询未完全核销的单据：预付单 */ A.ADVANCES_NO AS BILL_NO, #{BILL_UNVERIFY_ACTIVE_UF} AS BILL_PARENT_TYPE, A.BILL_TYPE AS BILL_TYPE, A.CUSTOMER_NAME AS CUSTOMER_NAME, A.CUSTOMER_CODE AS CUSTOMER_CODE, A.UNVERIFY_AMOUNT AS UNVERIFY_AMOUNT FROM STL.T_STL_BILL_ADVANCED_PAYMENT A WHERE A.CUSTOMER_CODE = #{customerCode} AND A.UNVERIFY_AMOUNT > 0 AND A.ACTIVE = #{BILL_UNVERIFY_ACTIVE_Y}
